name: Nian
movement: 50 ft. walking, 30 ft. climbing, 30 ft. swimming
description: The Nian is a large, fearsome creature with a robust body capable of traversing land and water. It has notable strength and exceptional presence in combat, reflected in its strong build.
memorable: Its unique ability to create areas of magical darkness and silence makes it highly effective in controlling battles.
goals: The Nian often seeks to terrify or dominate its foes through strategic use of its abilities.
relations: Often found in wilderness areas, it may be encountered alongside other monstrous creatures that dwell in similar environments.
environment: Forests and mountainous regions, particularly near bodies of water.
strengths: Immunity to poison and conditions like charm, paralysis, and a strong ability to control space and movement.
weaknesses: Highly susceptible to loud noises, fire, and the color red, which can instill fear and panic.
attacks: The Nian can deliver powerful melee attacks including a bite, gore, and a stomp on prone targets, showcasing its formidable physicality.
most_powerful_ability: Year's Termination creates a 15-foot radius of magical darkness and silence, rendering opponents unable to cast spells or perceive their surroundings effectively.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 60 feet, allowing it to see the unseen.
skills: Has a passive perception of 13, giving it an average ability to notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes while underwater.
Trampling Charge can knock opponents prone, enabling follow-up attacks.
Fearful of loud noises and fire, creating exploitable weaknesses in combat.
Strong physical attributes make it a resilient opponent.
test_queries: large chaotic monster that fears fire
powerful creature that creates magical darkness
fearful beast with strong melee attacks
Nian abilities that exploit noise and colors
